questions.question: What is the primary ingredient explicitly declared on the product's label?
Based on the label, what is the weight of the product in grams?
According to the label, is vegetable oil used in this product?
Does the product's label explicitly mention 'organic' as a descriptor?
Does the label provide information regarding potential allergens?
Is this product suitable for vegetarians, as indicated on its label?
What is the format of the information presented on the label?
Does the packaging contain any visual elements beyond text?
What is the overall color scheme of the product's label?
Is there any visual indication of the product's manufacturing date?
Does the label include a barcode or other machine-readable identifier?
What is the texture of the label's surface indicated by its appearance?
Does the label feature any graphic design elements?
Based on the text's appearance, is the font style consistent throughout?
What is the overall shape of the packaging's visible portion in the image?
